00331 #ifdef CELL_ENV_TSDK
00332 int ctk_spe_context_add_access_hint(ctk_spe_context_t spe, void *addr, ea_size_t size);
00333 #else /* !CELL_ENV_TSDK */
00334 static inline int ctk_spe_context_add_access_hint(ctk_spe_context_t spe, void *addr, ea_size_t size)
00335 {
00336     /* just touch the area */
00337     int i = 0;
00338     int lines = size / 16;
00339     volatile char c[lines];
00340     for (i = 0; i < lines; i++) {
00341         c[i] = *(char*)((unsigned long)addr + i * 16);
00342     }
00343     return CTK_SUCCESS;
00344 }
00345 #endif 
00351 #ifdef CELL_ENV_TSDK
00352 int ctk_spe_context_remove_access_hint(ctk_spe_context_t spe, void *addr);
00353 #else /* !CELL_ENV_TSDK */
00354 static inline int ctk_spe_context_remove_access_hint(ctk_spe_context_t spe, void *addr)
00355 {
00356     /* not supported */
00357     /* return CTK_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED; */
00358     return CTK_SUCCESS;
00359 }
00360 #endif
